text: Manuel Gallardo Lechet (3 May 1935 - 21 August 2020) was a Spanish actor. He was born in Cardena, Spain. His career began in 1961. His best known roles were as Juan in A Land for All (1962), Halaf in 100 Horsemen (1964) and as Fred in Saturday, Sunday and Friday (1979). Gallardo died on 21 August 2020 in Madrid, aged 85.Muere Manuel Gallardo, un actor imponente ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1935 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Spanish movie actors Category:Spanish television actors Category:Spanish voice actors Category:Spanish stage actors
title: Manuel Gallardo
